title: SRT synchronization tool
description:
This very small application lets you synchronize a .srt / *.txt subtitle file.

How to use:
1 - Choose the subtitle file you wish to synchronize
2 - Set whether to add or deduct x milliseconds
3 - Press Apply and you&#039;re done.

It&#039;s written in Visual Basic.NET, and it&#039;s VERY simple. It doesn&#039;t check for user errors but it removes the annoyanse of the text showing up two seconds before or a second after the dialogue starts in the movie.

Contains no virus, but I&#039;m sure you&#039;re not gonna trust my word on that :)
